# Fresh Nature - Natural Products Website

## About
Fresh Nature is a natural products company offering eco-friendly, plant-based products for home and personal care.

## Products
- Natural Deodorant: Aluminum-free, long-lasting protection
- Hand Wash: Gentle antibacterial formula with natural ingredients
- Dishwashing Soap: Powerful grease-cutting action with plant-based surfactants
- Natural Shampoo: Sulfate-free, nourishing hair care

## Website Structure
- Homepage: / (product listings and company information)
- Product Pages: /products/{product-slug}
  - /products/deodorant
  - /products/hand-wash
  - /products/dishwashing-soap
  - /products/shampoo

## Contact
Email: info@freshnature.com

## Values
- 100% Natural ingredients
- Eco-friendly and sustainable
- Cruelty-free and vegan
- Safe for sensitive skin
